marklogic.body:
You don't understand, any facts that dispute the storyline, are false on their face.
The story line is Trayvon, a sweet innocent 12 year old boy, unjustly accused of theft and drug usage was killed in Cold blood by an old fat white guy.
Never mind the photo of TrayvonÂ was at least 5 years old. Never mind Trayvon had been expelled multiple times Never mind Trayvon had stolen goods with him. Never mind Trayvon was evidently kicked out of Mom's house and sent to Dad's. Never mind Trayvon was 6 foot 3 inch gang banger with an attitude Never mind Trayvon tweetedÂ about hitting a buss driver Never mind Trayvon tweeted about abusing women Never mind Zimmerman was a democrat Never mind Zimmerman was Hispanic Never mind the neighborhood had problems with thefts
NEVER MIND THAT THIS TAKES ATTENTION OFF OBAMA'S FAILURES, Obamacare, the economy, out of control budgets, etc. etc. etc.Â AND PUTS ATTENTION ON RACE FOR THE 2012 ELECTION....
